name: Bargain Invaders
description:
The invaders are trying to runsack the earth, can you stop them and avoid getting shot in the process?

You control a ship and your main objective is to shoot down the enemy ships one by one till none stands.

As you make your way through the levels the difficulty level also ramps up be ready to face new enemy types, traps and even control two ships at the same time.

Also.... you only have one life, are you up to the challenge?

Features


  • Over 30 challenging levels to blaze through at launch
  • Enemy types that can adapt their speed, firing rate and more
  • Traps to avoid like asteroid belts and times bombs
  • A puzzly feeling in some levels
